      • apply

        public final float[] apply(double dt,
                           float[] sample)
        function to calculate instantaneous period (Tau_p) implements eqs 1-3 in : Allen, R.M., and H. Kanamori, The Potential for Earthquake Early Warning in Southern California, Science, 300 (5620), 786-789, 2003.
        Specified by:
        apply in class TimeDomainProcess
        Parameters:
        dt - the time-domain sampling interval in seconds.
        sample - the array of float values to be processed.
        Returns:
